comments.author: Chaudhry, Noor
comments.content: Hello there iI find this very very interesting trip you had it must been the adventure of your life time wont you agree. I was just doing a research on Kharan which is my birht place to see if there is anything about that tiny part of the world on this world wide web thingy. I was so surprised to see so much. I last visited Kharan last year after 14 years it was a very good adventure for me, I will never forget the tall mountains the dryness the people and so much more. I am trying to save up a little to go back soon. its not only my birth place but i have some property and a lot of raletives to visit I make a lot of phone call there because i am so for away in Canada toronto and i miss Kharan.

comments.author: Peter Sims
comments.content:
